ResourceDocument.Resource: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn:books" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="book"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="title" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="author" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="character"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="friend-of" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="since" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="qualification" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="isbn" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema>
